Package com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator

Deploy domain validation service and related interfaces.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IDeployMarker  
IDeployReporter Logging interface for reporting validation errors.
IDeployValidationContext The context on which the DomainValidator has been invoked.
IDomainValidator Implemented by deploy domain validators.
IDomainValidatorService Common interface between domain validators and the validator service.
ValidatorUtils.ITopologyOperation An operation over a deploy topology.
 

Class Summary
ConstraintService Constraint Service that manages the objects defined in the 'constraints' extension point.
DeployValidatorService Capability access point for SOA deploy topology validation extensions.
DomainValidator Provides a standard base class for extenders of the com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.domains extension point who provide a <validator /> element.
ValidatorUtils Utility methods to support validation, matching and resolution.
 

Package com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.validator Description

Deploy domain validation service and related interfaces.

Deploy Topology Validation Overview Documentation

Abstract [Index]

The units of a deployment topology can be validated using the extensible deploy validator service. The validator service delegates to domain validators which are declared using the domain extension point.

This documentation is maintained by Alexander V. Konstantinou (author{at}us.ibm.com).
